resources.string: لم يتم العثور علي حساب السائق بالنظر إلى اسم المستخدم وكلمة المرور

"Rides towards destination" helps you receive riders going towards your chosen route (e.g. towards home).

When you select this option, you will ONLY receive ride requests that finish close to your selected destination. We will exclude ride requests going far away from your destination, therefore the waiting time might be a bit longer than usual.

You can cancel matched rides by tapping "X" next to your destination address to receive regular ride orders.

يرجى ملاحظة أن هذه الوظيفة قد تحد من عدد الطلبيات التي تتلقى، حيث سوف تتلقى فقط الطلبات المتطابقة نحو وجهتك المختارة.\n\nهذه الخاصية محدود الإستخدام في اليوم الواحد اعتماداً على المدينة التي تعمل بها. أيضا، علما بأن بعض الحملات التخفيضين لا تنطبق على مطابقة هذه الطلبات.
Accepted requests will be shown here
Are you sure you want to activate the %s campaign?
Keep the app open while you wait, emergency teams have received your request.
Paid waiting time will apply for middle stop
You can add up to %1$d stops. Paid waiting time will apply for the middle stop.
After completing last accepted trip, you will be taken offline.
Going to a break means that after completing your last accepted trip, you will be taken offline.
Going to a break means that after completing your last accepted trip, you will be taken offline.
A stop has been added to the route
ساعات الانتظار و القيادة في تطبيق بولت
عدد الرحلات المنتهية من جميع الطلبات الواردة

أنت تستخدم إصدار أقدم من التطبيق، الرجاء تحديث التطبيق.
لم يعد يتم دعم إصدار التطبيق الذي تستخدمه، الرجاء تحديث للاستمرار.
Please note that for security reasons, your trip may be recorded by a passenger.

You can record conversations during the trip and send a file to Customer support when reporting trip issues. Recording is paused during phone calls, and the encrypted audio file will be deleted after 24 hours. You can find it on the Trip Details screen.
Trip was recorded. The encrypted file is stored for 24 hours.
To make in-app calls and audio recordings during trips, enable microphone access on the Settings page.
Audio recording in progress. This will be paused during phone calls and will stop when the trip ends.
You can record conversations during the trip and attach the file when reporting trip issues. Recording is paused during phone calls, and the encrypted audio file will be deleted after 24 hours.
Recording will continue after your ongoing phone call, and stop at the end of the current trip.
Incoming ride requests will be accepted automatically.\n\nAuto-Accept will be disabled when you decline, cancel or miss a ride request.
When turned on, all incoming ride requests will be accepted automatically.
You can later enable it from Settings
Launch navigation automatically when on active trip?

قمت برفض أو فوتت عدد كبير جداً من الرحلات.

Bonuses are paid out together with earnings
Higher prices are guaranteed at given times in the marked areas.
This campaign has ended. Sadly, you didn\'t finish it.
Results will be updated after each ride up until the end of the campaign.
يتم تحديث النتائج بعد كل رحلة حتى انتهاء وقت المكافأة.
عذراً، هذه المكافأة قد انتهت ولم تكملها
حافظ على اكمال الشروط حتى انتهاء وقت المكافأة. المكافأة المتوقعة %s

Are you sure you want to cancel the trip? You are close to completing the active campaign.
Cancelling the trip may affect your Driver Score. Are you sure you want to cancel?
Cancelling the trip may affect your Driver Score. It also may delay the completion of any active campaigns. Are you sure you want to cancel?
يجب أن تكون غير متصل كي تغير سيارتك الفعالة.

Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact your payment provider for more information.
Payment is being processed. Balance update may take up to 48h.
Set your default navigation and reach it faster during the ride.
A new version of Bolt Driver is available. Please update the app in order to continue.
Now you can use this button not only to quick access to app but to manage the trip when you are in an active trip.
You can view the campaign and all of its details by checking your Campaign list.
Next trip will be canceled and you will not receive new requests during an active trip.
The widget helps to manage the trip when you are in an active trip.
The button is displayed over applications to be able to receive orders
To change the address or stop searching for requests towards this destination, cancel the search.
You’ve just made an emergency call. Was it helpful or should we contact you?

قم بالقيادة مع بولت للحصول على مزيد من العملاء. قم بالاشتراك من هنا: %1$s
حساب السائق لم تتم الموافقة عليه
Your application has been disabled. Using an unofficial build is prohibited.
Your application has been disabled. Using an unofficial build is prohibited.\nInstall the application from the official store or contact support for more information.
Your application has been disabled because it is not valid. Using unofficial build is prohibited.
لقد تم تعطيل تطبيقك بسبب نشاط التطبيق المشبوه من قبل طرف ثالث.
لقد تم تعطيل التطبيق الخاص بك بسبب إعدادات الموقع غير كافية. تأكد من تشغيل نضام الملاحة Gps واختيار وضع الدقة العالية.
The application has been disabled due to suspicious third party app activity.
The application has been disabled due to suspicious third party app activity.\nContact support for more information.
The selected price will apply to all car categories and will not auto adjust for surge multiplier. Do you want to confirm this price?
“Bolt dynamic price” is your selected pricing method. Do you want to confirm this?
The selected base price will apply to all car categories and will not auto adjust for surge multiplier.
Custom pricing is not available in your current location, you can continue working with “Bolt dynamic price”.
Custom pricing is not available in your current location. Please proceed with Bolt’s dynamic price.

By choosing Bolt’s dynamic pricing you agree to standard base fares and their automatic adjustment based on market situation. Your price will always be competitive so you can get as many orders as possible.
Decide how you want to price yourself and be in full control.
Move the slider or tap the +/- button to set your desired price and see how competitive it is compared to other drivers in your city.
Choose your preferred pricing method and change it whenever you want.
Drive hassle free, take benefit of auto-pricing during peak times and view dynamic demand information.
Find out what reduced your score.
Tap this link to learn what influences Driver Score.
In the list below, you can see what exactly affected you

Here you can see you current score. Driver score is calculated based on the last 100 trips you completed. On the progress bar you can also see how close you are to the retraining or blocking thresholds.
الرصيد لا يشمل %1$s التي تلقيتها في المدفوعات النقدية.

خلال الساعات المقضية دون الاتصال بالنظام، الرجاء التأكد من أخذ قسطاً كافياً من الراحة حتى تتمكن من العمل بكل حرفية و حذر. مقدار الراحة يختلف من شخص لآخر ولكن ينبغي ان تكون ٦ ساعات من الراحة متتالية.

During the forced offline hours, please ensure you take a sufficient break so that you are well rested and alert before driving again. The amount of rest needed will differ from person to person but should be at minimum %d hour(s) of consecutive rest.
For road safety and to ensure high-quality service, Bolt places a 12-hour maximum driving limit from when you go online.
For road safety and to ensure high-quality service, Bolt places a %d hour(s) maximum driving limit from when you go online.
You have exceeded the maximum working hours limit
When you reach your 12-hour online limit, you’ll only be able to receive new orders after a 6-hour offline compulsory break.
When you reach your %d hour(s) online limit, you’ll only be able to receive new orders after a %d hour(s) offline compulsory break.

A list of available scheduled orders will be shown here
There is not enough space on your device to record audio. Free up storage space in Settings by deleting apps or files that you no longer need.
This enables easier access for the Driver app via the notification bar and keeps the app awake.
This enables chat push notification access for the Driver app via the notification bar.
This enables push notification access for the Driver app via the notification bar.
Passenger is waiting for you to arrive.
Follow the icon on the map
In order to make the app work properly, enable autostart for Bolt Driver.
Find Bolt Driver in the list of applications\nEnable autostart and disable restrictions for Bolt Driver

• Find Bolt Driver in the list of applications
  • Enable autostart and disable restrictions for Bolt Driver
In order to make the app work properly, disable battery optimisation for Bolt Driver.
Tap the downward arrow and choose All apps\nTap Bolt Driver and choose Don\'t optimise

• Tap the downward arrow and choose All apps
  • Tap Bolt Driver and choose Don\'t optimise
Exclude Bolt Driver from battery optimisation
Enable notifications to see new requests, cancellations, rider messages and more.
Find Bolt Driver in the list of applications\nAllow notifications

• Find Bolt Driver in the list of applications
  • Allow notifications
Enable sound notifications to avoid missing new requests, cancellations, rider messages and more.
Make sure notifications are enabled\nAllow sounds

Disabled additional permissions may prevent the Bolt Driver app from running in the background, opening by pressing the Quick Access button, or displaying new orders.\n\nPlease make sure “Show on Lock Screen” and other required permissions are enabled.
Allow Bolt to display over other apps in order to receive orders when you’re online.
Tap Allow and slide the toggle on the Settings screen to on\nSet the Quick access icon to on to see this icon over other apps

• Tap Allow and slide the toggle on the Settings screen to on
  • Set the Quick access icon to on to see this icon over other apps
Allow Bolt Driver to display over other apps
To make in-app calls enable microphone access. Turn on the microphone on the Settings page.

Due to failed payment, the order has been automatically cancelled.

We’d love to hear your feedback. Let us know what you think!
Is your Driver app working properly?
How would you rate the app?

We\'re sorry to heat that. Let us know how we can improve by telling us the most important issue you\'ve experienced
We\'re sorry to hear that. Let us know how we can improve by telling us the most important issue you\'ve experienced
We’re sorry to hear that. Please let us know how we can improve.
We’re happy to hear that.\nWould you like to share your experience by rating us on the Play Store?
We’ll make sure you’ll never receive a ride request from this person again. If you gave a low rating by accident, please contact our Customer Support.

When you share your ride details with friends or family via the link or a messenger, they’ll see your location and the ride status.
Sharing ride details via the link or any messengers with friends and family allows them to see where you are on a live map and ride status.

You can send a link to inform friends or family of your trip status and track your live location.

You’ve exceeded the maximum driving time limit.

For road safety and to ensure a high-quality service, Bolt has a maximum driving limit starting from when you go online. Time spent offline or between trips does not add to your online hours.\nYou’re allowed to drive a maximum of %d hours in any %d hour period. A countdown will indicate your remaining driving time before you’re required to take a rest. Once the timer runs out, you’re allowed to finish the current trip.
You’re permitted to drive %dh max in any %dh period.
You have less than 2 hours of driving time left.
Allowed driving time is %dh max in the last %dh. You have less than 2 hours of driving time left.
